name: Incipient Foes
description:
I spent a long time working on this game for the Brackeys Game Jam 2022.1 and really appreciate you taking the time to play my game. Just knowing that people are playing the game is more than enough but I would appreciate it if you took the time to give it a rating. 

Incipient Foes was a concept I came up with pretty soon after the theme was announced. I decided that, instead of coming up with one or two amazing game mechanics and spending most of my time on creating levels and exploring the concept like a “good” game developer, I would try to create a game with near-infinite scope. I want, procedurally generated levels, enemy AI implemented with machine learning, multiplayer, open world, VR support, a battle-royale mode, etc. That said, I don't know how to do most of that. So I'm going to focus on creating the start menu and hope the rest follows. 

I may not have been able to add everything I wanted, but I hope you enjoy it nonetheless.
